div.p: The Task and TaskRejected profiles represent the positive and negative statements for a task.

td.a: Task rejected using a value set

tr.td: Medication reconciliation not done due to patient declination; indicates that none of the tasks in the given not done value set were performed.
Medication reconciliation not done due to patient declination; indicates that the specific task, by code, was not done.
